description: With Tampa Bay tanking against the New Orleans Saints on Sunday, the Buccaneers have secured the rights to the top pick in the 2015 NFL Draft. |
title: Tampa Bay Is on the Clock: 2015 NFL Draft Order
title_page: Tampa Bay Is on the Clock: 2015 NFL Draft Order | Breitbart
text:
With Tampa Bay tanking against the New Orleans Saints on Sunday, the Buccaneers have secured the rights to the top pick in the 2015 NFL Draft. Tampa Bay and Tennessee need quarterbacks, so 2015â€™s draft appears a redo of 1993 or 1998. Bledsoe or Mirer? Manning or Leaf?
Do the Buccaneers go for home-state favorite Jameis Winston or his Heisman Trophy successor in Marcus Mariota?
Courtesy of ProFootballTalk.com, here are the first 2o picks in the 2015 NFL Draft:
1. Tampa Bay (2-14)
2. Tennessee (2-14)
3. Jacksonville (3-13)
4. Oakland (3-13)
5. Washington (4-12)
6. N.Y. Jets (4-12)
7. Chicago (5-11)
8. Atlanta (6-10)
9. N.Y. Giants (6-10)
10. St. Louis (6-10)
11. Minnesota (7-9)
12. Cleveland (7-9)
13. New Orleans (7-9)
14. Miami (8-8)
15. San Francisco (8-8)
16. Houston (9-7)
17 Kansas City (9-7)
18. San Diego (9-7)
19. Cleveland (from Buffalo 9-7)
20. Philadelphia (10-6).
